title: Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           1212 West Montgomery Road  Tuskegee Institute, AL 36088                 Directions         From Atlanta - Follow I-85S towards Montgomery, AL  Take Exit 32 and turn left on the overpass onto Pleasant Springs Dr. Travel approximately 2 miles and turn left on Franklin Rd. (Co. Rd. 30).  Follow Franklin Rd. for 3 miles to the traffic light. Park headquarters on the left corner..  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site is open Monday-Saturday, 9:00 am - 4:30 pm CST. The site is closed Sundays, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Year's Day.   Standard Hours    Sunday: Closed   Monday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Thursday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Friday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Saturday: 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM      Additional Information View More       Christmas Day:   -       New Year’s Day:   -       Thanksgiving Day:   -                  Weather           The weather in Tuskegee is generally sunny with an average of 218 sunny days annually.  Tuskegee gets an average of 52 inches of rain per year. The high in July averages 92 degrees, and the average low in January is 34 degrees.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Tuskegee Institute Entrance Fee - $0.00 There are no entrance fees for Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site.         Visitor Centers                    Movable School   When planning your visit to the Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site, there are some basic things you need to know to have a great visit.
